name: Dungeon Bluff: a business card RPG
name_original: Dungeon Bluff: a business card RPG
description:
A 2+ player, dungeon crawling, competitive, coin-based, bluff RPG made for the Pleasure-not-Business Card RPG Jam.

In Dungeon Bluff, the Dungeon Master forces every adventurer to believe in the description of the situation or try their luck by tossing a coin on their own.

The game takes two sides of a business card and requires only a coin.
